entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 3:19 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: N 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then a few flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
